description.en:
LUCKY is a completely decentralized lottery on the binance smart chain network. 888,888 LUCKY provides a holder with 1 ticket into lotteries which never expires.  There are two drawings whenever funds collected triggers a lottery. A smaller Lucky Draw for 888 BUSD and a larger Jackpot Draw for 88,888 BUSD. The more tickets that a wallet holds the more likely it is to win.

Transactions in LUCKY are taxed 8% split four ways. 2% each is (i) contributed to jackpot, (ii) burned, (iii) distributed across all holders and (iv) added to liquidity.
